title: Angular Universal App Options Schema
description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to set up server-side rendering for an app.

appId.description: The application identifier to use for transition.

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root NgModule file.

rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root NgModule class.

skipInstall.description: Do not install packages for dependencies.
